parameters.name: PointsCount
parameters.description: Number of reference points for this dimension

title: IDimension.IGetReferencePoints
description: Gets the reference points for this dimension.

parameters.name: PointsCount
parameters.description: Number of reference points for this dimension

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to the IMathPoint object VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
IDimension::IGetReferencePointsCount
before calling this method to determine the size of the array.
